about_the_game:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at the making of The Coming End.

In this book, see more than 200 images from the sets of The Coming End, Fresh Force Frustrations, and Spotlight Adventure Comics. See unused artwork from the game and comics, plus concept art, interviews with the cast, and go inside Ms. Angel Food's muscle-bound writing room where she wrote The Coming End story.

Meet the tentacles who bound up our heroes, the makeup and special effects used to turn men into monsters, and intimate moments between models.

Find out how this erotic adventure was put together with a voyeuristic peek. Exclusive NSFW images included!

Includes PDF book, plus separate sets of NSFW high-res images from behind the scenes.

***

HOW TO ACCESS DLC FILES
DLC files found with in the game installation path
Once downloaded, you'll find this in the DLC of Fresh Force Frustrations in your Steam Library. Right-click the name of the game, click on Properties, then go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the DLC there.

Example file path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\TheComingEndFreshForce

content_descriptors.notes: This behind the scenes look at the erotic novel and game includes depictions of oral and anal sex between gay men, all in a play on the behind the scenes interviews before and after porn videos. Characters in these scenes are consenting to BDSM play, with some images showing bondage, tentacles, and self pleasure.
